title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Management Documents
body: Management Documents       Klondike Gold Rush NHP Foundation Statement.  Download (PDF 18.7 MB).  Park Enabling Legislation. Klondike Gold Rush NHP General Management Plan 1997. Download (PDF 15.1 MB).  Klondike Gold Rush NHP General Management Plan - Record Of Decision 1997. Download (PDF 777 KB).     Dyea Documents Dyea Area Plan - Environmental Assessment 2014. Download (PDF 11.1 MB).  Dyea Area Plan - Finding of No Significant Impact 2014. Download (PDF 2.8 MB).  Dyea - Horse Closure Cost Benefit Analysis 2014. Download (PDF 177 KB).  Dyea - Horse Closure Regulatory Flexibility Threshold Analysis 2015. Download (PDF 150 KB).
